meanings.sent1: She worked hard to strengthen her glutei at the gym.
meanings.sent2: Sitting on hard surfaces can sometimes cause discomfort in the glutei.
meanings.sent3: During the race, his glutei felt like they were on fire from all the running.
meanings.sent4: Her glutei were like two powerful pistons propelling her up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The glutei are essential for maintaining good posture and balance.
